#Text=Begin Selling
#Text=Avon
#Text=Avon is one of the best-known cosmetics companies around the world .
#Text=It is also one of the most popular ways to start your own business through direct selling .
#Text=With beauty products , bath and body items , clothing and household goods amongst its product lines , selling Avon can be a lucrative opportunity for people looking to make some extra money .
#Text=The start-up cost is very low and the process is quick and simple .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Becoming an Avon Representative
#Text=Apply to become an Avon sales representative .
#Text=You can do this online via Avon 's website and a person from Avon 's corporate office will get back to you .
#Text=Go to the " Your Avon " website and click on " Apply Now .

#Text=Click  Submit " and wait to be contacted by an Avon representative to complete the sign-up process .

column1: #Text=Alternately , you can contact an Avon representative and sign up with them .
#Text=If you know someone selling Avon , ask them to help you sign up .
#Text=They receive incentives for recruiting other members .
#Text=Complete your discussion with the corporate representative .
#Text=This is not an interview per se , just an informative phone meeting so you can learn more about how the business functions and what it takes to become an Avon rep .

#Text=If there is an Avon representative in your area , they will ask to meet with you at this time and discuss the process over coffee or lunch so that they can give you more information about Avon .
#Text=This person will become your mentor if you have any questions as you build your business .
#Text=Pay the fee to get started .
#Text=Avon is available all around the world , so check with your local office to find out what fee you will pay .

#Text=In the United States , the fee is $ 25 and pays for a starter kit , including sales information , your first order forms , brochures , and a website where your customers can purchase things and have it credit your account .
#Text=In most cases , the starter kit will be mailed to you .
#Text=Start your online training .
#Text=Avon offers full training online for both new reps and those who already have some experience .
#Text=Check out the product lines while you 're at it ; you will need to know these thoroughly if you want to be a successful Avon representative .
#Text=Establishing a Customer Base
#Text=Set up your website .
#Text=This will probably be one of your main sources of income .
#Text=Avon provides each representative with a personalized website they can use to take orders , give information about the products and disseminate contact information .
#Text=Name your website URL something that 's easy to remember ; it could be your name or something that grabs prospective customers ' attention .
#Text=Even though Avon is called a " direct selling " company , you do n't have to go door-to-door to sell it anymore .
#Text=You can use your website to sell Avon to customers who are not even near you geographically , for example , by sending the link to your online store to family in another state .
#Text=In fact , some Avon reps sell exclusively online .
#Text=Order extra materials to get started .
#Text=New Avon sales representatives get a discount on samples , so stock up while you can .
#Text=You will also receive free brochures to assist you in selling Avon .
#Text=Order some business cards with your name , phone number , email address and website printed on them .
#Text=You have to pay for all of the sales materials you order , but according to Avon , these start up costs are usually recovered in the first month of your business .
#Text=Spread the word .
#Text=It 's important that you let everyone know that you 're now selling Avon ; customers wo n't just come to you !
#Text=Distribute brochures to friends , family members , co-workers and people at your church , gym , grocery store or anywhere else you frequent on a regular basis .
#Text=Consider asking local businesses if you can leave the brochures in the break room or front lobby .
#Text=Be sure to attach your business card to the brochures so people will know who to contact when they want to purchase Avon products .
#Text=Utilize social media , especially if you have a lot of friends or follows on websites like Facebook or Twitter .
#Text=Let everyone know you are now selling Avon and post about products you love .
#Text=Try not to overdo it , since most people do n't appreciate having their feeds overwhelmed with sales pitches .
#Text=The best posts are those that give your personal experience with products that you love .
#Text=Consider setting up a party to help you get started selling Avon products .
#Text=While parties are not required , it can be a useful selling tool .
#Text=Growing Your Business
#Text=Form relationships .
#Text=Avon and other direct-selling businesses succeed or fail based on your ability to reach out to people and create loyal clients .
#Text=This means you have to be willing to put yourself out there and start conversations !
#Text=Consider everyone you meet a potential customer .
#Text=This includes people at church , other parents in the PTA , people at work or at your spouse 's work , and the people you chat up at the playground .
#Text=Avon gives its new representatives the suggestion that they should try to talk to three people about Avon every day .
#Text=That might seem like a lot , but when you realize that most of those conversations will not result in a sale , it is n't that many after all .
#Text=Use your products .
#Text=Avon makes all types of products , from make-up , shampoo , and conditioner , to clothing , shoes , and jewelry .
#Text=They even make décor , gift items , and toys for children .
#Text=When you use your own products , you are better equipped to talk up the benefits .
#Text=Plus , if you receive a compliment on your eye shadow or shoes , you can launch into a pre-planned sales pitch about Avon and the affordable price of the item .
#Text=Recruit new reps .
#Text=Avon leadership involves recruiting and mentoring new sales reps , and results in bonuses and residual income whenever your new recruits make sales goals .
#Text=In order to recruit new representatives , you have to meet certain sales goals and become qualified to be an official leader .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Do n't forget to order new Avon brochures every two weeks .
#Text=When orders are due , you should go ahead and purchase a set of brochures for the next campaign cycle .
#Text=There are 26 campaigns per year .
#Text=Quick Summary
